name: Web Polarr
description: Polarr is a free online image processor, users only need to input the website instead of downloading the software. Polarr provides multiple ways for image editing, it supports high pixel image process, and can directly import RAW files to process.

en_US.description: Polarr is a free online image processor, users only need to input the website instead of downloading the software. Polarr provides multiple ways for image editing, it supports high pixel image process, and can directly import RAW files to process.
en_US.name: Web Polarr

zh_CN.description: 泼辣修图是一款免费在线图像处理软件，用户无需下载该软件，输入网址即可使用。泼辣修图提供多种图像调整方式，支持高像素图像处理，并且可以直接导入RAW文件进行处理等。
zh_CN.name: 泼辣修图网页版
